channel.title: reidlewis tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from reidlewis.

item.description: Thanks, @johnkrausphotos, for all that you do & this spectacular shot of the #Octagrabber! Your photo highlights two umbilicals (hoses) that trail behind #Octy, one yellow & one black. Theories? Electricity, remote control, video, hydraulics, compressed air, fire supression? https://t.co/h3SENW86PE https://t.co/wtBOLm79Ru
After reading about the new #AppleVR headset, I offer this vision of air travel in the future courtesy of @KLM https://t.co/of3JpVmTS5 https://t.co/1qFkut0erX https://t.co/uz19JmeK40
